title: How to Be Good at Madden 07

steps.headline: Play it.
steps.description: In general, the more you play a game, the better you will get.

steps.headline: Master the controls.
steps.description: If you keep mixing up the buttons, you will not improve. The more you play, the more familiarized you will get with the controls. Consulting the manual helps too.

steps.headline: Always use "Ask Madden".
steps.description: It makes the game a lot simpler by not needing the knowledge of what does what.

steps.headline: Go level by level.
steps.description: Start on easy with all the necessary aids on so that the game is really easy, and slowly build up.

steps.headline: Try different plays.
steps.description: Your opponent will predict what you will do if you use the same plays again and again. On offense, mix up passes with rushes. On defense, mix up blitzes with different types of coverage.

text: Play it. In general, the more you play a game, the better you will get. Master the controls. If you keep mixing up the buttons, you will not improve. On defense, mix up blitzes with different types of coverage.
